data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Chris Kavanagh awards Southampton a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Ryan Bertrand gets his shot on target but fails to score for Southampton.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at St. Mary's Stadium.
Can Southampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
In the minute 7, In Southampton Southampton attack through Stuart Armstrong. The finish is off target, however.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for West Bromwich close to the penalty box.
West Bromwich drive upfield and Matheus Pereira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Southampton defender.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 13, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Southampton's Danny Ings is on target but unsuccessful.
In Southampton Southampton drive forward through Che Adams. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 16, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Southampton's Kyle Walker-Peters gets in a shot on goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
West Bromwich's Matheus Pereira gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Southampton defender.
In the minute 17, Kyle Edwards of West Bromwich smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 20, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Southampton.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 23, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick West Bromwich.
In the minute 26, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jake Livermore (West Bromwich) has received a yellow card from Chris Kavanagh.
Danny Ings (Southampton) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Southampton.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Southampton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
In the minute 29, Southampton's Che Adams breaks free at St. Mary's Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at St. Mary's Stadium.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Southampton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 35, Che Adams of Southampton is pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Stuart Armstrong for Southampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 38, Chris Kavanagh awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in their own half.
Southampton's Danny Ings gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Goal! Moussa Djenepo gives Southampton a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
In the minute 45, Chris Kavanagh blows against West Bromwich's Matheus Pereira for offside.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
West Bromwich are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sam Field is replacing Kyle Edwards for West Bromwich at St. Mary's Stadium.
Important block from the Southampton defence as Dara O'Shea fires in a strike for West Bromwich.
In the minute 47, West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Throw-in Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 49, Southampton to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in Southampton.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 50, Moussa Djenepo (Southampton) gets a yellow card.
West Bromwich drives forward and Grady Diangana gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Free kick West Bromwich.
West Bromwich's Kyle Bartley attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
Southampton's Kyle Walker-Peters has been booked in Southampton.
The home team have replaced Moussa Djenepo with Nathan Redmond. This is the first substitution made today by Ralph Hasenhuttl.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Southampton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 60, Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
Slaven Bilic (West Bromwich) is making a second substitution, with Hal Robson-Kanu replacing Callum Robinson.
Throw-in West Bromwich.
In the minute 61, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of West Bromwich.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, The away team replace Romaine Sawyers with Filip Krovinovic.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick West Bromwich.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Goal! Southampton extend their lead to 2-0 through Oriol Romeu.
In the minute 69, That's a fine assist from Stuart Armstrong.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Southampton.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 74, West Bromwich pushes forward through Hal Robson-Kanu, whose finish on goal is saved.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Southampton to check on Hal Robson-Kanu, who is grimacing with pain.
Hal Robson-Kanu for West Bromwich is back on the field again.
In the minute 78, Chris Kavanagh signals a Southampton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Southampton.
Southampton's Kyle Walker-Peters misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 79, West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to West Bromwich's area.
Free kick in a good position for Southampton!
In the minute 81, Southampton push forward at St. Mary's Stadium and Jan Bednarek gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the West Bromwich defence.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Southampton push forward at St. Mary's Stadium and Oriol Romeu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
In the minute 82, Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 83, Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at St. Mary's Stadium.
Shane Long is on a sub for Che Adams for Southampton.
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 87, Free kick West Bromwich.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to West Bromwich's area.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 89, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Southampton.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Chris Kavanagh awards Southampton a goal kick.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
That's full-time at St. Mary's Stadium. The final score is 2-0.
